guest.title: Book as Guest
guest.description: Interested in being a guest on our show? We'd love to hear from you!

cooking.title: Cooking Collaboration
cooking.description: Partner with us on cooking projects

support.title: Technical Support
support.description: Having issues with our website or content?

map.title: Visit Our Studio
map.description: Come visit us at our beautiful studio in the heart of Belgrade.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our podcast and services.

guest.question: How can I become a guest on your show?
guest.answer: Simply fill out the contact form with 'Book as Guest' selected as the reason, and we'll get back to you with more information.

response.question: How long does it take to get a response?
response.answer: We typically respond to all inquiries within 24-48 hours during business days.

recipe.question: Can I submit my own recipes?
recipe.answer: Yes! We're always interested in featuring new recipes. Please contact us through the form with 'Cooking Collaboration' as the reason.

consulting.question: Do you offer cooking consultations?
consulting.answer: Yes, we offer personalized cooking consultations. Select 'Cooking Collaboration' when contacting us for more information.

footer.about: Discover more about Natalia's story, her journey, and passion for cooking and storytelling.

newsletter.title: Newsletter
newsletter.description: Subscribe to our newsletter to receive the latest news and recipes.

auth.accountCreated: Account created successfully! Please check your email to confirm your account.
auth.passwordLength: Password must be at least 6 characters

admin.title: Admin Panel

banner.title: We value your privacy
banner.description: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience, analyze traffic and personalize content. By clicking 'Accept', you consent to our use of cookies.

necessary.title: Necessary Cookies
necessary.description: These cookies are essential for the website to function properly.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website.

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: These cookies are used to track visitors across websites for personalized advertising.
